categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Spanner" was the nickname of a clone trooper corporal who served in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. He was stationed in the Jedi Temple hangar with Sergeant Joker. The sergeant often told jokes to pass the time, which Spanner often did not understand. The two clones also served on the Iceberg III Republic outpost during the Mission to Iceberg Three.
